Knoxville.Isaac Ziegler House:
The Isaac Ziegler House was a historic home once located at 712 North 4th Street in Knoxville, Tennessee. Designed by prominent Knoxville catalog architect George Franklin Barber, it was listed on the National Register of Historic Places, and described as the most ornate Queen Anne-Romanesque house in Tennessee.


== History ==

The house was built in 1892.
